text: A Facebook page is a public profile
for an organization or person.
Rather than adding you as a friend,
Facebook users can choose to become
a fan of your page by liking it.
On your Facebook homepage,

click the plus icon
next to your name here.
Click on "Page."
Type your page name here.
Choose a category here.
Suggestions will be made as you type.
Write a page description here if you wish.
Click "Create Page" here to create it.
Now you'll be able to add a profile image
and a cover photo by either clicking here

or dragging and dropping
onto the web browser.
Click "Save" here to save any changes.

You'll now be able to
create posts, add photos,

and add buttons enabling people
to take action on your page.

People will be able to
search for your page
and like it to follow it.
